Package no.hiof.webframework.Repository

Class UserDb

java.lang.Object
no.hiof.webframework.Repository.UserDb
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserDAO
public class UserDb extends Object implements UserDAO
The UserDb class implements the UserDAO interface and provides methods to save, get and delete user objects from the temporary database.

      Retrieves a user object from the database based on the username.
      Specified by:
      get in interface UserDAO
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
